text.tspan: Write how would you describe the program in one minute or less.

tspan.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:5.99722242px;font-family:'Trade Gothic LT Std';-inkscape-font-specification:'Trade Gothic LT Std, Normal';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-feature-settings:normal;text-align:start;writing-mode:lr-tb;text-anchor:start;stroke-width:0.26458332

text.tspan: Imagine you find yourself in an elevator with an executive from a

tspan.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:5.99722242px;font-family:'Trade Gothic LT Std';-inkscape-font-specification:'Trade Gothic LT Std, Normal';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-feature-settings:normal;text-align:start;writing-mode:lr-tb;text-anchor:start;stroke-width:0.26458332

text.tspan: local business. You have until you reach the lobby to capture their

tspan.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:5.99722242px;font-family:'Trade Gothic LT Std';-inkscape-font-specification:'Trade Gothic LT Std, Normal';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-feature-settings:normal;text-align:start;writing-mode:lr-tb;text-anchor:start;stroke-width:0.26458332

text.tspan: interest. This business is very important in your community and

tspan.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:5.99722242px;font-family:'Trade Gothic LT Std';-inkscape-font-specification:'Trade Gothic LT Std, Normal';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-feature-settings:normal;text-align:start;writing-mode:lr-tb;text-anchor:start;stroke-width:0.26458332

text.tspan: would make a great professional resource for the International

tspan.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:5.99722242px;font-family:'Trade Gothic LT Std';-inkscape-font-specification:'Trade Gothic LT Std, Normal';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-feature-settings:normal;text-align:start;writing-mode:lr-tb;text-anchor:start;stroke-width:0.26458332

text.tspan: Visitor Leadership Program. What would you say?
